body: Hey guys! As some of you know, I have a youtube channel but I don't have a "Proper" or "Professional" Profile picture/ thumbnail. I am looking for someone who could help me out by making me a thumbnail/profile picture. Thanks for reading! Have a good day!
body_tagged: Hey guys! As some of you know, I have a youtube channel but I don't have a "Proper" or "Professional" Profile picture/ thumbnail. I am looking for someone who could help me out by making me a thumbnail/profile picture. Thanks for reading! Have a good day!
title: Thumbnails and Profile picture

replies.body:
yah i'll have a go now. Add me on skype and i'll send it to you.

Samiad456

yah i'll have a go now. Add me on skype and i'll send it to you.

replies.body:
Well, I'm not sure exactly HOW you would like it to look so i can't make it for you, BUT i can give you two websites, where you can make a profile picture that has your very own players skin and a background of your choice. Here you go:

http://minecraft.novaskin.me
okay so on this one you can move around your character into a fancy/cool position and have a minecraft background, OR you can just save the picture of your character  and use a background from THIS sight, where you upload your character photo and you can add it to the background image you have chosen: http://www.picmonkey.com so yeah.. oh and by the way, to edit your profile pic on this sight just click Edit up the top when you get to the main page! hope your channel works out!
replies.body_tagged:
Well, I'm not sure exactly HOW you would like it to look so i can't make it for you, BUT i can give you two websites, where you can make a profile picture that has your very own players skin and a background of your choice. Here you go:
